content.text: The Cemas were a species of sentient beings. They had feet. At least one member of the species had entered the galactic community by 17 ABY. That year, the smuggler Han Solo helped a Cemas to its feet in the Crystal Jewel casino on Coruscant after a bomb went off in the New Republic Senate Hall nearby.

An unnamed Cemas appears in the novel The New Rebellion, written by Kristine Kathryn Rusch and published by Bantam Spectra in 1996. The story provides little information about the species and only uses the term Cemas in the singular, leaving the plural form undefined. The book refers to the individual as an it, but the context is unclear whether this specifically refers to the Cemas's gender.
